bibl.title: Two Documentary Second-Century BC Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. P. Texas Inv. 6 [Harry Ransom Humanities Research Center, University of Texas at Austin]. Petition concerning trespass of sheep. Kaine (Fayum), 12 May 184 or 6 May 160. - 2. P. Texas Inv. 30. Fragment of an official letter. Provenance unknown, mid-second cent. BC.
bibl.seg: MARTINEZ David, Two Documentary Second-Century BC Papyri.

1. P. Texas Inv. 6 [Harry Ransom Humanities Research Center, University of Texas at Austin]. Petition concerning trespass of sheep. Kaine (Fayum), 12 May 184 or 6 May 160. - 2. P. Texas Inv. 30. Fragment of an official letter. Provenance unknown, mid-second cent. BC.
